alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 11:55AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Moffat and central Rio Blanco Counties through 1230 PM MDT... At 1155 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles east of Rangely to 25 miles southwest of Meeker. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meeker. This includes the following highways... Colorado 13 between mile markers 25 and 57. Colorado 64 between mile markers 38 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
